original_text: For thou hast made him most blessed for ever: thou hast made him exceeding glad with thy countenance.
korean_text: 그가 영원토록 지극한 복을 받게 하시며 주 앞에서 기쁘고 즐겁게 하시나이다

sentences.original_text: For thou hast made him most blessed for ever
sentences.korean_translation: 주께서 그를 영원히 가장 복되게 하셨으니

sentences.original_text: thou hast made him exceeding glad
